author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

This PR checks for the condition that triggered #26722 at booking time. It seems to be more common than I expected.

This indicates that the problem was not caused (or exposed) by HCAL/Phase2 DQM, but rather that something in ROOT or the framework made it show up.

#### PR validation:

This PR is mainly for validation of the issue discovered in #26722 in the PR tests. It should be save to merge into an IB, though for now, the tests will fail until all subsystem code is fixed.
title: DQM: Assert non-zero-width range for histograms
